snippet.title: My most insane run. Poison, Spikes, Tankability this is THE Poison Ranger build | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
The most enjoyable run I've ever had in this game. Pineapples triggering both the Poison Ivy and the Pandamonium for a total of +3 Poison for my enemy and +1 spike for myself.
Corrupted Crystals on the armor (+gives6 Armor for every 7 debuffs inflicted) me all the tankability I need.

snippet.title: Complete Noob Plays Civilization V | First Game in a Decade EP9
snippet.description:
A complete Civilization noob tries to win their first game of Civilization 5.
I first played this game a decade ago, had some fun with for a bit, but I recall this feeling of not knowing at all what was happening.
Now a decade later and hopefully a decade smarter I come back with a with newfound determination to finally win a game of Civilization 5.

Website: https://asimpletouch.org/
